Desc.eng: Inquisitor, we have already lost countless Hivers to the Dark Eldar raids. The Drukhari consider our world a hunting ground and we are powerless against them. We are asking for your help.
Inquisitor! Those blasted Drukhari raiders are back again with their infernal machines and their slavers to kidnap our citizens. We are unable to contain this threat any more.

[You gain points for exacting Vengeance on the enemy. Each kill earns points depending on the type. \n\nThe mission time is limited by a Pain Harvest bar, which increases when a Pain Catalyst is present on the map. Destroy Pain Catalysts as quick as you can to delay the Pain Harvest bar and thus gain more time to earn points.]

[You gain points for exacting Vengeance on the enemy. Each kill earns points depending on the type. 

The mission time is limited by a Pain Harvest bar, which increases when a Pain Catalyst is present on the map. Destroy Pain Catalysts as quick as you can to delay the Pain Harvest bar and thus gain more time to earn points.]

NOT AVAILABLE IN COOP MODE
The foul Drukhari have returned to our world and they keep preying on Imperial subjects. This is clearly a problem for the Inquisition. We are asking you to intervene.
The frequency of the Drukhari incursions has increased on our world recently. The Xenos always strike unexpectedly and we are helpless against these raids. We need your help, Inquisitor.
Rest assured, Lord Commissar, I will take care of the Drukhari threat.
I have other pressing matters to attend, Lord Commissar. I trust you can stand your ground for a little longer.
Inquisitor, the Xenos problem on this world has escalated to the point where we must ask for the help of the Holy Ordos. Purge the foul Drukhari and stop this madness!
Inquisitor, this world has been plagued by Dark Eldar raiders for a very long time. I must admit that our forces are powerless against these Xenos. We need your help.
Inquisitor, the Drukhari threat needs to be contained but we are losing this impossible war. We are asking for your intervention immediately. These kidnappings must be stopped.
